text: so I look at food as being something
that should be pleasurable first so the
idea of creating synthetic meat it seems
antithetical to everything I believe in
which is to say I see it as the enemy
anytime you discuss food as sustenance
first without any consideration for
happiness joy magic even we waste a lot
of meat in this country there are plenty
of cuts of meat off the animal that we
throw away and do not use and you can
make wonderful things out of those
products I think we should be doing that
long before we start thinking about
growing like product in the lab and if
you're a vegetarian or a vegan and you
are spending your time patting yourself
on the back and you're eating a meat
like substitute bait from some weird soy
product how do you think they develop
that stuff like how do they know it
tastes like me somebody somewhere is
killing something believe me and stuffs
awful in any case
